org.apache.hadoop.hbase

类 ScanPerformanceEvaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.AbstractHBaseTool
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ScanPerformanceEvaluation
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Tools")
public class ScanPerformanceEvaluation
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.AbstractHBaseTool
    A simple performance evaluation tool for single client and MR scans and snapshot scans.
